author: Angela (Super Saver Sidekick)
title: ToysRUs: FREE Shipping Sitewide + Extra 20% Off
text:
Through tomorrow, head on over to ToysRUs.com where you can save an additional 20% off select items when you enter promo code SPRING20 at checkout. PLUS you’ll score FREE shipping sitewide!
Check out these deals I spotted… FAO Schwartz 27″ Big Horse $99.99 (regularly $159.99)
Only $79.99 shipped with promo code SPRING20 
Playmation Marvel The Avengers Starter Pack Repulsor $19.99 (regularly $49.99)
Only $15.99 shipped with promo code SPRING20 
VTech 2-in-1 Discovery Table $29.99 (regularly $39.99)
Only $23.99 shipped with promo code SPRING20 
Imaginarium All-in-One Wooden Train Table 100-Piece Set $64.99 (regularly $129.99) GONE 
Only $51.99 shipped with promo code SPRING20
